scripts.build-cordova: cd ./build && node cordova.js && cd ../cordova && cordova build
scripts.start-android: cd ./build && node cordova.js && cd ../cordova && cordova run android
scripts.build-electron: shx rm -rf ./electron/out && cd ./build && node electron.js && cd ../electron && npm run make
scripts.start-electron: cd ./build && node electron.js && cd ../electron && npm run start
scripts.init: npm install && npm run generate-assets && cd ./cordova && cordova platform add android && cd ../electron && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd.. && npm run build-all
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-cordova && npm run build-electron
